steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/npm
args:
apt-get update && apt-get install -y jq git curl && 
\
                NAME=$(gcloud secrets versions access latest --secret=NAME) && 
\
                API=$(gcloud secrets versions access latest --secret=API) && 
\
               echo 'Fetching secrets...' && 
\
               echo "NAME=$_NAME" && echo "API=$_API" && 
\
               _CLIENT_REPOS_JSON=$(curl -s -L "$_API/krane/get-app-data?name=$_NAME") && 
\
               echo "Response: $_CLIENT_REPOS_JSON" && 
\
               echo "$_CLIENT_REPOS_JSON" | jq -c '.repos.client[]' | while read -r client; do 
\
                 PROJECT_NAME=$(echo "$client" | jq -r '.name'); 
\
                 echo "Cloning $PROJECT_NAME into client/$_PROJECT_NAME"; 
\
                 git clone https://github.com/genesiskrane/gk-vite "client/$_PROJECT_NAME"; 
\
                 cd "client/$_PROJECT_NAME"; 
\
                 npm install; 
\
                 npx vite build; 
\
                 find . -mindepth 1 ! -name 'dist' ! -path './dist/*' -exec rm -rf {} +; 
\
                 cd -; 
\
               done
